posts.title: Trending technologies for frontend web development
posts.author: Abdessamad
posts.excerpt: Exploring the latest technologies and frameworks that are shaping the future of frontend development.

content.body:
Frontend web development is evolving rapidly, with new frameworks and tools emerging constantly. In this post, we'll explore some of the most trending technologies that are making waves in 2024.

React and Next.js

React continues to dominate the frontend landscape, with Next.js providing an excellent framework for server-side rendering and static site generation.

Vue.js 3

Vue.js 3 brings improved performance and a better developer experience with the Composition API.

TypeScript

TypeScript adoption continues to grow as developers seek better type safety and tooling support.

posts.title: Advice for young engineers and mistakes you can avoid
posts.author: Abdessamad
posts.excerpt: Lessons learned from my journey as a software engineer and common pitfalls to avoid.

content.body:
Starting a career in software engineering can be overwhelming. Here are some key lessons I've learned along the way.

Don't Try to Learn Everything

Focus on mastering one technology stack before jumping to the next shiny framework.

Build Projects, Not Just Tutorials

Real-world projects teach you problem-solving skills that tutorials can't.

Code Reviews Are Your Friend

Embrace feedback and use code reviews as learning opportunities.

posts.title: Easy and intuitive git commands you must know!
posts.author: Abdessamad
posts.excerpt: Essential Git commands that every developer should master for efficient version control.

content.body:
Git is an essential tool for every developer. Here are the most important commands you need to know.

Basic Commands

git clone [url]
git status
git add .
git commit -m 'message'
git push

Branching

git branch
git checkout -b [branch-name]
git merge [branch-name]

Useful Tips

Always check your status before committing, and write clear commit messages!
